comments.html:
Finally!!! They must have hired some new younger people over there or those older punch card guys finally retired :-) ... Sure beats the method I had been using which was to use FTP in my broswer then take a guess at which was the right one:

ftp://ftp.ietf.org/rfc/

ftp://ftp.ietf.org/internet-drafts/
